languages.text: Культисты смерти указали отсек нижних палуб, в котором начался путь Матери-паучихи — это грузовая магистраль. И там же начнется путь Лорд-капитана, ведущий к храму смерти.

The death cultists have pointed out where on the lower decks the path of the Matriarch Spider began — the freight line. Thus, it must likewise serve as the starting point on the Lord Captain's journey to the temple of death.
languages.original_text: Культисты смерти указали отсек нижних палуб, в котором начался путь Матери-паучихи — это грузовая магистраль. И там же начнется путь Лорд-капитана, ведущий к храму смерти.

traits.locale_text: The death cultists have pointed out a bay on the lower decks where the path of the Matriarch Spider began — the freight line station. Thus, it must likewise serve as the starting point on the Lord Captain's journey to the temple of death.

The death cultists have pointed out where on the lower decks the path of the Matriarch Spider began — the freight line. Thus, it must likewise serve as the starting point on the Lord Captain's journey to the temple of death.

The death cultists have pointed out where on the lower decks the path of the Matriarch Spider began — the freight line. Thus, it must likewise serve as the starting point on the Lord Captain's journey to the temple of death.

languages.text: Les cultistes de la mort ont indiqué que l'araignée matriarche avait commencé son périple dans les ponts inférieurs. La ligne de fret en question doit donc également servir de point de départ {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} {mf|s'il|si elle} veut espérer trouver le temple de la mort.
languages.original_text: The death cultists have pointed out where on the lower decks the path of the Matriarch Spider began — the freight line. Thus, it must likewise serve as the starting point on the Lord Captain's journey to the temple of death.

traits.locale_text: Les cultistes de la mort ont indiqué que l'araignée matriarche avait commencé son périple dans les ponts inférieurs. La ligne de fret en question doit donc également servir de point de départ {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} {mf|s'il|si elle} veut espérer trouver le temple de la mort.

languages.text: Los cultistas de la muerte han indicado en qué lugar de las cubiertas inferiores comenzó la senda de la Araña Matriarca: la línea de carga. Esa misma línea debe servir como punto de partida para el viaje de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán hacia el templo de la muerte.
languages.original_text: The death cultists have pointed out where on the lower decks the path of the Matriarch Spider began — the freight line. Thus, it must likewise serve as the starting point on the Lord Captain's journey to the temple of death.

traits.locale_text: Los cultistas de la muerte han indicado en qué lugar de las cubiertas inferiores comenzó la senda de la Araña Matriarca: la línea de carga. Esa misma línea debe servir como punto de partida para el viaje de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán hacia el templo de la muerte.

languages.text: 死のカルトの信者たちは、女帝クモの母の道が始まった場所を指し示している-貨物線。つまりそのべイはまた、ロード・キャプテンが死の神殿へ向かう旅の出発点となるに違いない。
languages.original_text: The death cultists have pointed out where on the lower decks the path of the Matriarch Spider began — the freight line. Thus, it must likewise serve as the starting point on the Lord Captain's journey to the temple of death.

traits.locale_text: 死のカルトの信者たちは、女帝クモの母の道が始まった場所を指し示している-貨物線。つまりそのべイはまた、ロード・キャプテンが死の神殿へ向かう旅の出発点となるに違いない。

languages.text: 拜死教教徒指向了底层甲板的货运区域，蛛母族长就是从那里踏上了织网之路。因此，若是行商浪人打算前往死亡的圣殿，这场旅途也必须从这片甲板启程。
languages.original_text: The death cultists have pointed out where on the lower decks the path of the Matriarch Spider began — the freight line. Thus, it must likewise serve as the starting point on the Lord Captain's journey to the temple of death.

traits.locale_text: 拜死教教徒指向了底层甲板的货运区域，蛛母族长就是从那里踏上了织网之路。因此，若是行商浪人打算前往死亡的圣殿，这场旅途也必须从这片甲板启程。

languages.text: Die Todeskultisten haben auf eine Bucht in den unteren Decks verwiesen, wo der Pfad der Matriarchenspinne begann … die Frachtroute. Also muss eben diese Bucht auch Ausgangspunkt der Reise des Lord Captains zum Tempel des Todes sein.
languages.original_text: The death cultists have pointed out where on the lower decks the path of the Matriarch Spider began — the freight line. Thus, it must likewise serve as the starting point on the Lord Captain's journey to the temple of death.

traits.locale_text: Die Todeskultisten haben auf eine Bucht in den unteren Decks verwiesen, wo der Pfad der Matriarchenspinne begann … die Frachtroute. Also muss eben diese Bucht auch Ausgangspunkt der Reise des Lord Captains zum Tempel des Todes sein.

languages.text: Ölüm tarikatçıları, Örümcek Kraliçe'nin alt güvertelerdeki yolculuğunun nerede başladığını işaret etti: Yük hattı. Dolayısıyla burası, Lord Kaptan'ın ölüm tapınağına olan yolculuğunun da başlangıç noktası olmalı.
languages.original_text: The death cultists have pointed out where on the lower decks the path of the Matriarch Spider began — the freight line. Thus, it must likewise serve as the starting point on the Lord Captain's journey to the temple of death.
